item.title: Melinda French Gates Didn’t Fund Her Daughter’s Startup. Experts Call It a Smart Move

item.title: Inside Gaza’s world of ‘cash brokers’ as currency disappears: ‘We lose nearly half of our money just to be able to spend it’
